title: Lyrics To Go
text: This app was created using multiple APIs. It allows the user to find song lyrics and album artwork based on a search. The interface is clean and user friendly.

title: Handcrafted Heirloom
text: This website was built for a client to help gain additional exposure for their business. It was built with react, using mysql for database interaction as well as the paypal API.

title: Critical Hit
text: This app was made for quick creation of RPG characters. The user can choose to create a new character with new specifications, or pull up the data on a previously created character. This app was built using mysql and javascript.
